          <i class="fa fa-youtube">
          </i>
         </a>
        </li>
        <li class="google_plus">
         <a class="social-link social-link-google_plus is-tracked" data-action="Google Plus" data-category="Click:SocialLink" href="https://plus.google.com/107983757783332819799" rel="publisher" target="_blank" title="Find us on Google+">
          <i class="fa fa-google-plus">
          </i>
         </a>
        </li>
       </ul>
      </div>
     </div>

      </li>
      <li class="google_plus">
       <a class="social-link social-link-google_plus is-tracked" data-action="Google Plus" data-category="Click:SocialLink" href="https://plus.google.com/107983757783332819799" rel="publisher" target="_blank" title="Find us on Google+">
        <i class="fa fa-google-plus">
        </i>
       </a>
      </li>
     </ul>
    </nav>
   </div>
  </header>
  <div class="wrapper-inner l-leader-top-wrapper">

    <div class="now-reading">
     <span class="reading">
      Now Reading:
     </span>
     <h4>
      Snowboarding's 34 Members of the Triple Cork Club
     </h4>
     <div class=" single-social">
      <div class="fb-like" data-href="http://onboardmag.com/features/snowboardings-members-of-the-triple-club.html" data-layout="button_count" data-send="false" data-show-faces="false" data-width="70">
      </div>
      <div class="pw-widget pw-counter-horizontal pw-share-popups" pw:title="Snowboardings 34 Members of the Triple Cork Club" pw:url="http://onboardmag.com/features/snowboardings-members-of-the-triple-club.html">
       <a class="pw-button-facebook look-native pw-counter-none">
       </a>
       <a class="pw-button-twitter pw-look-native pw-counter-none">

       <!-- &lt;a class="pw-button-post-share pw-counter-none"&gt;&lt;/a&gt; -->
      </div>

    </div>

     <i class="fa fa-long-arrow-up">
     </i>
    </a>
   </header>
   <section class="l-two-columns wrapper-inner title-block splitpost-gallery">
    <nav class="breadcrumbs" itemscope="" itemtype="http://data-vocabulary.org/Breadcrumb" role="breadcrumbs">
     <a class="crumb" href="http://onboardmag.com" itemprop="url" rel="home" title="Home">

       Home
      </span>

    <div class="single-large-heading">
     <header class="single-top">
      <h1 class="single-title">
       Snowboarding's 34 Members of the Triple Cork Club
      </h1>
      <div class="single-meta">
       <div class="single-meta-info">
        <time class="date" datetime="2013-11-22T12:41:57+00:00" itemprop="datePublished" title="22nd November 2013">
         <i class="fa fa-clock-o">
         </i>
         <b>
          2 years ago
         </b>
        </time>
        <span class="author-meta" itemscope="" itemtype="http://data-vocabulary.org/Person">
         <a class="author-name is-tracked" data-action="Onboard Snowboarding" data-category="Click:Article Author" href="http://onboardmag.com/author/admin" itemprop="name">
          <img alt="Onboard Snowboarding" itemprop="photo" src="http://www.gravatar.com/avatar/815a6776998f84cb8e3eb0f7699f4db9?s=200&amp;d=404" title="Onboard Snowboarding"/>
          <span itemprop="givenName">
           Onboard
          </span>
          <span itemprop="familyName">
           Snowboarding
          </span>
         </a>
        </span>
       </div>
      </div>
     </header>
     <p class="key">
      <strong>
       Tip:
      </strong>
      <em>
       Use the left
       <i class="fa fa-long-arrow-left">
       </i>
       / right
       <i class="fa fa-long-arrow-right">
       </i>
       arrow keys
      </em>
     </p>
    </div>
    <div class="l-left-column">

        </li>
        <li class="splitpost-page">
         <div class="video-wrapper">
          <iframe allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="573" mozallowfullscreen="" src="http://mpora.com/videos/AAdpcfsgcgxc/embed?brand=onboard&amp;category=snowboarding&amp;tags=postid-78251%2Bfeatures%2Bcork%2Bsnowboarding%2Btricks%2Btriple" webkitallowfullscreen="" width="1020">
          </iframe>
         </div>
        </li>
        <li class="splitpost-page">
         <div class="video-wrapper">
          <iframe allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="573" mozallowfullscreen="" src="http://mpora.com/videos/AAdshwbyg4hc/embed?brand=onboard&amp;category=snowboarding&amp;tags=postid-78251%2Bfeatures%2Bcork%2Bsnowboarding%2Btricks%2Btriple" webkitallowfullscreen="" width="1020">
          </iframe>
         </div>
        </li>
        <li class="splitpost-page">
         <div class="video-wrapper">
          <iframe allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="573" mozallowfullscreen="" src="http://onboardmag.com/external/videos/embed?brand=onboard&amp;category=snowboarding&amp;tags=postid-78251%2Bfeatures%2Bcork%2Bsnowboarding%2Btricks%2Btriple&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fvimeo.com%2F87675520%0D%0A" webkitallowfullscreen="" width="1020">
          </iframe>
         </div>
        </li>
       </ul>
       <nav class="splitpost-direction-nav">
        <a class="splitpost-btn prev is-tracked" data-action="Prev Middle" data-category="Splitpost" data-splitpost="prev-btn" href="http://onboardmag.com/features/snowboardings-members-of-the-triple-club.html/29">
         <i class="fa fa-chevron-left">
         </i>
        </a>
        <a class="splitpost-btn next is-tracked" data-action="Next Middle" data-category="Splitpost" data-splitpost="next-btn" href="http://onboardmag.com/features/snowboardings-members-of-the-triple-club.html/2">
         <i class="fa fa-chevron-right">
         </i>
        </a>
       </nav>
      </div>
      <div class="splitpost-nav bottom">
       <a class="splitpost-btn prev is-tracked" data-action="Prev Bottom" data-category="Splitpost" data-splitpost="prev-btn" href="http://onboardmag.com/features/snowboardings-members-of-the-triple-club.html/29">
        <i class="fa fa-chevron-left">
        </i>
        Previous
       </a>
       <div class=" single-social">
        <div class="fb-like" data-href="http://onboardmag.com/features/snowboardings-members-of-the-triple-club.html" data-layout="button_count" data-send="false" data-show-faces="false" data-width="70">
        </div>
        <div class="pw-widget pw-counter-horizontal pw-share-popups" pw:title="Snowboardings 34 Members of the Triple Cork Club" pw:url="http://onboardmag.com/features/snowboardings-members-of-the-triple-club.html">
         <a class="pw-button-facebook look-native pw-counter-none">
         </a>
         <a class="pw-button-twitter pw-look-native pw-counter-none">
         </a>
         <!-- &lt;a class="pw-button-post-share pw-counter-none"&gt;&lt;/a&gt; -->
        </div>
       </div>
       <a class="splitpost-btn next is-tracked" data-action="Next Bottom" data-category="Splitpost" data-splitpost="next-btn" href="http://onboardmag.com/features/snowboardings-members-of-the-triple-club.html/2">
        Next
        <i class="fa fa-chevron-right">
        </i>
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="">
      <div class="single-wrap single-content" data-splitpost="content-wrapper">
       <h2 data-splitpost="title">
        Intro
       </h2>
       <div class="slide-content" data-splitpost="content">
        <p>
         Right folks, so the
         <strong>
          age of triples
         </strong>
         started some time ago and it is kind of hard too keep track about all the riders who are in the triple club. We combined our forces and compiled a
         <strong>
          list of all
         </strong>
         <strong>
          triple stompers
         </strong>
         . How many riders have stomped a triple so far? 6? 10? 15? Click yourself through our list of triple members and find out!
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
      <nav class="splitpost-classic-nav">
       <a class="splitpost-btn prev is-tracked" data-action="Prev Last" data-category="Splitpost" data-splitpost="prev-btn" href="http://onboardmag.com/features/snowboardings-members-of-the-triple-club.html/29">
        <i class="fa fa-chevron-left">
        </i>
        Previous
       </a>
       <a class="splitpost-btn next is-tracked" data-action="Next Last" data-category="Splitpost" data-splitpost="next-btn" href="http://onboardmag.com/features/snowboardings-members-of-the-triple-club.html/2">
        Next
        <i class="fa fa-chevron-right">
        </i>
       </a>
      </nav>
      <div class="single-bottom">
       <div class="article-single-tags">
        <h3 class="article-tags-title">
         Topics:
        </h3>
        <div class="article-tags">
         <a class="is-tracked" data-action="Cork" data-category="Click:Article Tags" href="http://onboardmag.com/tag/cork">
          Cork
         </a>
         <a class="is-tracked" data-action="Snowboarding" data-category="Click:Article Tags" href="http://onboardmag.com/tag/snowboarding">
          Snowboarding
         </a>
         <a class="is-tracked" data-action="Tricks" data-category="Click:Article Tags" href="http://onboardmag.com/tag/tricks">
          Tricks
         </a>
         <a class="is-tracked" data-action="Triple" data-category="Click:Article Tags" href="http://onboardmag.com/tag/triple">
          Triple
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>

      <h3 class="widget-title">
       Featured
      </h3>
      <div class="widget-content">
       <article class="article-listed-small grid-mobile-1 article-type-post">
        <a class="article-listed-thumb is-tracked" data-action="Featured Sidebar Articles" data-category="Click:Featured Sidebar Articles Widget" data-label="Position 1" href="http://onboardmag.com/videos/crew-edits/team-finland-at-send-off-session-2015.html" title="Team Finland at Send Off Session 2015">

         <article class="article-listed-small grid-mobile-1 thumbnail article-type-post">
          <a class="article-listed-thumb is-tracked" data-action="Popular On Onboard" data-category="Click:Trending Articles Widget" data-label="Today:Position 4" href="http://onboardmag.com/snowboard-gear/gear-news-and-previews/gopro-launch-hero4-session.html" title="GoPro Launch Hero4 Session">
           <img alt="gopro hero4" class="article-medium-thumb " height="190" src="http://static.thumbor.mpora.com/U9oXkxviQ_gsfIa8T_t_kjktq9o=/340x190/smart/http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.coresites.factorymedia.com%2Fonboard%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2015%2F07%2Fgopro-hero4.jpg" width="340"/>
          </a>
          <div class="article-body">
           <h4 class="article-title">
            <a class="is-tracked" data-action="Popular On Onboard" data-category="Click:Trending Articles Widget" data-label="Today:Position 4" href="http://onboardmag.com/snowboard-gear/gear-news-and-previews/gopro-launch-hero4-session.html" title="GoPro Launch Hero4 Session">
             GoPro Launch Hero4 Session
            </a>
           </h4>
           <p class="article-meta">
           </p>
          </div>
         </article>
         <article class="article-listed-small grid-mobile-1 thumbnail article-type-post">
          <a class="article-listed-thumb is-tracked" data-action="Popular On Onboard" data-category="Click:Trending Articles Widget" data-label="Today:Position 5" href="http://onboardmag.com/videos/full-parts/one-day-snowpark-zermatt-eric-beauchemin.html" title="One Day in Snowpark Zermatt with Eric Beauchemin">
           <img alt="" class="article-medium-thumb " height="190" src="http://static.thumbor.mpora.com/u-Rfo7FUx0jVfHZF4-Odj0MlwxQ=/340x190/smart/http%3A%2F%2Fcdn.coresites.factorymedia.com%2Fonboard%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2014%2F10%2FEric-Beauchemin-Zermatt.jpg" width="340"/>
          </a>
          <div class="article-body">
           <h4 class="article-title">
            <a class="is-tracked" data-action="Popular On Onboard" data-category="Click:Trending Articles Widget" data-label="Today:Position 5" href="http://onboardmag.com/videos/full-parts/one-day-snowpark-zermatt-eric-beauchemin.html" title="One Day in Snowpark Zermatt with Eric Beauchemin">
             One Day in Snowpark Zermatt with Eric Beauchemin

        <div class="tabs-content trending-month-content">
         <article class="article-listed-small grid-mobile-1 no-thumbnail article-type-post">
          <div class="article-body">
           <h4 class="article-title">
            <a class="is-tracked" data-action="Popular On Onboard" data-category="Click:Trending Articles Widget" data-label="This Month:Position 1" href="http://onboardmag.com/videos/teasers-videos/beskid-boys-in-japan.html" title="Beskid Boys in Japan">
             Beskid Boys in Japan
            </a>
           </h4>
           <div class="article-excerpt">
            Polish riders Micha Kondrat, Micha Ligocki, and Wojtek Pajk, make the pilgrimage to Japan.
           </div>
           <p class="article-meta">
           </p>
          </div>
         </article>
         <article class="article-listed-small grid-mobile-1 no-thumbnail article-type-post">
          <div class="article-body">
           <h4 class="article-title">
            <a class="is-tracked" data-action="Popular On Onboard" data-category="Click:Trending Articles Widget" data-label="This Month:Position 2" href="http://onboardmag.com/videos/snowboarder-falls-50ft-into-crevasse-in-chamonix.html" title="Snowboarder Falls 50ft into Crevasse in Chamonix">
             Snowboarder Falls 50ft into Crevasse in Chamonix
            </a>
           </h4>
           <div class="article-excerpt">
            Note to self: dont fall down a crevasse while snowboarding
           </div>
           <p class="article-meta">
           </p>
          </div>
         </article>
         <article class="article-listed-small grid-mobile-1 no-thumbnail article-type-post">
          <div class="article-body">
           <h4 class="article-title">
            <a class="is-tracked" data-action="Popular On Onboard" data-category="Click:Trending Articles Widget" data-label="This Month:Position 3" href="http://onboardmag.com/videos/crew-edits/snowboarding-withdrawals-these-guys-have-the-solution.html" title="Snowboarding Withdrawals? These Guys Have the Solution">
             Snowboarding Withdrawals? These Guys Have the Solution
            </a>
           </h4>
           <div class="article-excerpt">
            No snow, no biggie
           </div>
           <p class="article-meta">
           </p>
          </div>
         </article>
         <article class="article-listed-small grid-mobile-1 no-thumbnail article-type-post">
          <div class="article-body">
           <h4 class="article-title">

             Rabbit Escapes Avalanche Set Off by Snowboarder DCP
            </a>
           </h4>
           <div class="article-excerpt">
            Watch a poor, ickle, helpless bunny escape the clutches of certain death when it manages to leap from an avalanche...

   <h5>
    Newsletter Terms &amp; Conditions
   </h5>
   <p>
    Please enter your email so we can keep you updated with news, features and the latest offers. If you are not interested you can unsubscribe at any time. We will never sell your data and you'll only get messages from us and our partners whose products and services we think you'll enjoy.
   </p>
   <p>
    For our full
    <a href="http://mpora.com/about/privacy" target="_blank">
     Privacy Policy
    </a>
    as well as
    <a href="http://mpora.com/about/terms" target="_blank">
     Terms &amp; Conditions
    </a>
    please visit
    <a href="http://mpora.com" target="_blank">
     mpora.com
    </a>
    .

  <script type="text/javascript">
   var pwidget_config = {
    trackAddressBar: true,
    defaults: {
      afterShare: false,
      gaTrackSocialInteractions: true,
      sharePopups: true,
      services: {
        p_share_popup: 'tumblr, pinterest, stumbleupon, reddit, digg, delicious, email, more',
        twitter: {
          via: "onboardmag"
        }
      },
      transformations: {
        tracking: true
      },
      onshare: function(service){
        url = window.location.href.replace(window.location.hash, '');
        window.Tracker.trackSocial(service, "share", url);
        return false;
      }
    }
  };
  </script>

  </script>

  </script>

We combined our forces and compiled a &lt;strong&gt;list of all&lt;\/strong&gt; &lt;strong&gt;triple stompers&lt;\/strong&gt;. How many riders have stomped a triple so far? 6? 10? 15? Click yourself through our list of triple members and find out!&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":1,"title":"1. Torstein Horgmo - fs triple cork 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;It was spring 2010 in Folgefonna, Norway, when Torstein Horgmo started the whole madness. His fs triple cork 1440 was &lt;strong&gt;the first triple cork ever&lt;\/strong&gt; stomped. At the 2011 X Games Big Air Torstein was the only one who threw a triple and it got him first place. But only last season did Torstein &#8211; along with Marc McMorris and a few others &#8211; start to attempt triple corks in regular slopestyle events. This also brought an early end to Torstein\u2019s season when he overshot a jump at the Euro X 2013 slopestyle doing a bs triple cork 1440. Hopefully he will kick off the new season in top form again.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":2,"title":"2. Mark McMorris - bs triple cork 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;During the winter of 2010\/2011 Mark became the &lt;strong&gt;second rider to stomp a triple cork&lt;\/strong&gt; and he had no problems performing them in slopestyle competitions last season. Mark is a young determined kid who always goes for perfection &#8211; as you can see in the video.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":3,"title":"3. Sebastien Toutant - bs triple cork 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;It took him a couple more weeks than his pal McMorris but at last Seb Toots also came up with his triple trick. His &lt;strong&gt;bs triple cork 1440&lt;\/strong&gt; at a closed Red Bull session in Squaw Valley, Tahoe, was pretty steezy.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":4,"title":"4. Pat Burgener \u2013 sw bs triple cork 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;The triple cork revolution continued a couple days after Seb Toots&#8217; triple when then unknown 16-year-old Swiss rider stomped a &lt;strong&gt;switch bs triple cork&lt;\/strong&gt;, a trick that no one had done before.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":5,"title":"5. Bastien Destine \u2013 triple frontflip","content":"&lt;p&gt;In the 2008-2009 Bataleon edit Tyler Chorlton landed a triple frontflip in the backcountry but the scene is cut right after the landing so we can\u2019t tell if he stomped it all the way. What we know for sure is that the unknown Belgian rider Bastien Destine stomped his &lt;strong&gt;triple frontflip&lt;\/strong&gt; in the Les2Alpes Snowjam competition. Nothing too stylish but balls of steel.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":6,"title":"6. Kevin Jones - triple backflip","content":"&lt;p&gt;To sum up the 2010\/2011 season we should mention the backcountry triple backflip by the American snowboarding legend Kevin Jones. At the biblical &lt;strong&gt;age of 36&lt;\/strong&gt; Kevin showed us it is never too late to try new tricks. To see the triple check out his part in the &lt;strong&gt;Standard films TB20&lt;\/strong&gt;.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":7,"title":"7. Billy Morgan \u2013 triple bs rodeo, bs triple cork 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;The winter 2011\/2012 triple parade started in December. A crazy Briton from Shirley became famous after throwing down the &lt;strong&gt;first triple bs rodeo&lt;\/strong&gt; ever. Billy Morgan&#8217;s footage has now almost one million views which is almost as much as &lt;a href=\"http:\/\/www.youtube.com\/watch?v=ItjFQA-2jCs\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;Janet Jackson\u2019s tit slip&lt;\/a&gt; during Super Bowl. In 2013 Billy added a &lt;strong&gt;bs triple cork 1440&lt;\/strong&gt; to his repertoire:&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;a href=\"http:\/\/mpora.com\/videos\/AAderm83nuul\"&gt;Video&lt;\/a&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":8,"title":"8. Mark Hoyt \u2013 fs triple cork 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;In the stream of new footage and tricks Mark\u2019s achievement came through almost unnoticed. But in fact Mark Hoyt became the &lt;strong&gt;second person after Torstein who stomped a fs triple cork 1440&lt;\/strong&gt;.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":9,"title":"9. Staale Sandbech \u2013 triple underflip 1260, bs triple cork 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;This all favourite Norwegian ripper never fails to come up with some new amazing stuff. During a session with his pal Jorn Simen Aaboe at Vierli in April 2012 Staale liked the jump so much that he decided to go for it. You can check out the result for yourself. Later on he stepped up his game to a &lt;strong&gt;bs triple cork 1440&lt;\/strong&gt;.&lt;iframe src=\"\/\/www.youtube.com\/embed\/wc5vRrBnARM?rel=0\" height=\"349\" width=\"620\" allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\"&gt;&lt;\/iframe&gt; &lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":10,"title":"10. Jorn Simen Aaboe \u2013 triple fs rodeo 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;Jorn Simen got himself also a first\u2026the&lt;strong&gt; first triple fs rodeo 1440&lt;\/strong&gt;! He also has the bs triple cork 1440 in his trick bag! That\u2019s what we call a man of action!&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":11,"title":"11. Yuki Kadono \u2013 bs triple cork 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;The young Japanese talent defeated Peetu at the Beijing Air and Style 2012 after he unexpectedly stomped a &lt;strong&gt;bs triple cork 1440&lt;\/strong&gt; in his last attempt claiming the event\u2019s first place.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":12,"title":"12. Maxence Parrot \u2013 bs triple cork 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;The show continued in Davos and it was spectacular. Young guns Maxence Parrot and Kyle Mack went all in and it paid off. The former threw down a &lt;strong&gt;perfect bs triple cork 1440&lt;\/strong&gt; which meant the first place.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":13,"title":"13. Kyle Mack \u2013 triple fs rodeo 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;Kyle Mack gave a fitting response to &lt;a href=\"http:\/\/onboardmag.com\/features\/snowboardings-members-of-the-triple-club.html\/13\"&gt;Maxence Parrot&lt;\/a&gt; and became the &lt;strong&gt;first to show a triple fs rodeo in the competition&lt;\/strong&gt;. The hand-drag on the landing probably cost him the first place but what the hell&#8230; you don\u2019t get to stomp a triple rodeo every day.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":14,"title":"14. Shaun White \u2013 bs triple cork 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;Things got intense when this footage of Shaun landing a &lt;strong&gt;bs triple cork 1440&lt;\/strong&gt; got out. This shows how well the American robot prepares for the &lt;strong&gt;Olympics 2014&lt;\/strong&gt;. If he aims to dominate the slopestyle competition he needs to bring out the big guns.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":15,"title":"15. Marcus Kleveland\u00a0 - bs triple cork 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;It was quite a shock when we saw this video of \u00a0the &lt;strong&gt;13-year-old&lt;\/strong&gt; Norwegian snowboard talent. Not many kids would have balls this big&#8230; Youngest rider ever to throw down a triple cork, or &#8211; to be accurate &#8211; a &lt;strong&gt;bs triple cork 1440&lt;\/strong&gt;.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":16,"title":"16. Christian Primrose - bs triple cork 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;This young Canadian surprised everyone including himself at the Quiksilver Downlow competition in Ontario last March. Naturally talented rider who landed his first double only a month before this triple attempt.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":17,"title":"17. The Norwegians","content":"&lt;h2&gt;&lt;strong&gt;17: Brage Richenberg, Jorn Simen Aaboe, 18: Gjermund Braaten, 19: Emil Andre Ulsletten, 20: Torgeir Bergrem, 21: Sondre Tiller, 22: Aleksandr Oestreng&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;\/h2&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;The end of the last season was completely in the hands of the Norwegian flying machines. They threw a huge private party at &lt;strong&gt;Northstar&lt;\/strong&gt; and besides emptying beer cans they also built a nice slushy big air. We can only speculate if it was the beautiful weather, slushy landing or beer that encouraged them to go this big. One after another they stepped up their game and here is the bottom line:&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Brage Richenberg&lt;\/strong&gt; \u2013 triple backflip&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Jorn Simen Aaboe&lt;\/strong&gt; \u2013 ss bs triple cork 1440&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Gjermund Braaten&lt;\/strong&gt; \u2013 bs triple cork 1440&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Emil Andre Ulsletten&lt;\/strong&gt; \u2013 ss bs triple cork 1440, cab triple cork 1260&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Torgeir Bergrem&lt;\/strong&gt; \u2013 bs triple cork 1620 \u2013 &lt;span style=\"color: #ff0000;\"&gt;first ever landed!&lt;\/span&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Sondre Tiller&lt;\/strong&gt; \u2013 cab triple cork 1260&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Aleksandr Oestreng&lt;\/strong&gt; \u2013 bs triple cork 1440&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;We believe if it hadn&#8217;t been for &lt;strong&gt;Ulrik\u2019s injury&lt;\/strong&gt; he would have thrown down some sick tricks as well.&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Successful triple attempts have been booming so if we forgot to mention anyone just let us know!&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":18,"title":"18. Nils Arvidsson - triple underflip","content":"&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Thanks to our observant readers we serve you 4 more members of the triple club!&lt;br \/&gt;\n&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;br \/&gt;\nNils &#8216;Cobra&#8217; Arvidsson&lt;\/strong&gt;\u00a0might have been the first ever to stomp a triple cork if he managed to complete\u00a0&lt;a href=\"http:\/\/onboardmag.com\/news\/triple-cork-attempt-nils-arvidsson.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;his 2010 attempt&lt;\/a&gt;. We had to wait almost two years before he finally came up with his new triple. You can watch it either in the Standard Films 2112 or in this Ripcurl edit.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":19,"title":"19. Takahiro Ishida - triple backflip","content":"&lt;p&gt;Japanese rider decided to get dizzy at &lt;strong&gt;High Cascade Session Camp Session 3 in 2012&lt;\/strong&gt;.\u00a0One of a few riders who put it down on a park jump.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":20,"title":"20. Seppe Smits - bs triple cork 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;Seppe at 1:39!&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;It was only a matter of time for the &lt;strong&gt;belgian spinning machine&lt;\/strong&gt; to come up with his own triple. It went down during &lt;strong&gt;Winter X Big Air finals in Aspen 2013&lt;\/strong&gt;.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":21,"title":"21. Scotty James - bs triple cork 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;Scotty at 0:46!&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;This aussie supertalent is &lt;strong&gt;the most recent member&lt;\/strong&gt; of the triple club. He put it down at the Mile High competition &lt;strong&gt;in Perisher last week&lt;\/strong&gt;. Scotty is one of the biggest aussie hopes for the upcoming Olympics taking part in both slopestyle and superpipe.&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Special Thanks to\u00a0Jonathan Cobra Nilsson\u00a0and\u00a0Christophe De Groof for the reminders!&lt;\/strong&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":22,"title":"22. Kasper\u00a0Kumpulainen","content":"&lt;p&gt;Here&#8217;s a triple frontflip from a unknown Finnish kid by the name of Kasper Kumpulainen on what looks like a 25 foot kicker. It&#8217;s certainly not the prettiest looking thing ever but a triple it remains!&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":23,"title":"23. M\u00e5ns Hedberg\u00a0- fs triple cork 1440","content":"&lt;p&gt;Swedish ripper dropped his season edit and surprised us with his flawless fs triple. Check out this edit full of bangers! Mark 2:57 for the magic.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":24,"title":"24. Sven Thorgren","content":"&lt;p&gt;By the looks of his edit from the Scandalnavians movie, young Swedish ripper Sven Thorgren had one of the best sessions of his life on a pretty serious booter out in\u00a0\u00c5re. Backside 1440, backside 1440 triple, Cab triple underflip, and Cab 1440 all learnt in a day. Welcome to the triple club Sven!&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":25,"title":"25. Jamie Nicholls","content":"&lt;p&gt;British rider Jamie Nicholls kills it on kickers and it was high time that he got a triple under his belt. While training in the Stubai Prime Park this November, Jamie chucked his first ever backside triple 1440. Head to 1.37 to check it out.&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":26,"title":"26. Kalle J\u00e4rvilehto","content":"&lt;p&gt;Here&#8217;s a newly stomped backside triple cork 1440 from another crazy-talented and relatively unknown Finnish kid by the name of &lt;strong&gt;Kalle J\u00e4rvilehto&lt;\/strong&gt;. Its&#8217; a dime a dozen these days!&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;&#8220;Eighteen year old Kalle J\u00e4rvilehto decided last night that it&#8217;s needless to wait for sunny and soft spring conditions to try the triple. A dark and cold Vuokatti snowpark served as the arena for this Talma boy who has followed the steps of Peetu Piiroinen and few other finnish pro&#8217;s and relocated to Vuokatti to study at the Snowboarding high school. Seems like at least the riding part of studying is paying off. Keep an eye out for this young man in the future. He gave a bit of a storm warning already last year at the O&#8217;Neill Evolution when he beat Seb Toutant in his head to head semifinal battle and advanced to the final. Coming back from a nagging little injury the future looks pretty bright for this young lad.&#8221;\u00a0&lt;\/em&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;Nice one Kalle!&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":27,"title":"27. Nicolino Dioli","content":"&lt;p&gt;Nicolino Dioli became the first Italian snowboarder to land a triple cork 1440, stepping it up on a perfectly shaped booter in Chiesa Valmalenco.&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;The achievement marked the first triple cork by an Italian rider and was made all the sweeter by the fact that it happened on Italian snow. Big up Nico!&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;a href=\"http:\/\/onboardmag.com\/videos\/full-parts\/nicolino-dioli-lands-the-first-ever-italian-triple-cork.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;Nicolino Dioli Lands the First Ever Italian Triple Cork&lt;\/a&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;\n"},{"displayed_number":28,"title":"28. Joris Ouwerkerk","content":"&lt;p&gt;Dutch snowboarder Joris Ouwerkerk dropped this video showing him stomping the bejesus out of a textbook backside triple cork 1440 in Mayrhofen.&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;It\u2019s pretty damn legit we have to say, with three defined corks and none of that slight shoulder dipping that has been called incorrectly in many a contest over the last few years.&lt;\/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;a href=\"http:\/\/onboardmag.com\/videos\/full-parts\/joris-ouwerkerks-backside-triple-cork-1440.html\" target=\"_blank\"&gt;Joris Ouwerkerk Lands the First Dutch Triple Cork&lt;\/a&gt;&lt;\/p&gt;\n"}]};
/* ]]&gt; */
